name: PC BSD Installer Package
summary: Learn about .PBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PBI files are used to install PC-BSD, a desktop-based operating system that is built from FreeBSD, which is a variant of the original BSD (Berkeley Software Distribution) platform. FreeBSD was initially released in 1993 and is the most widely-used open source distribution of BSD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
